nodes.text: Sump was an astronomical object in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that was the homeworld of the Nuknog species.

Sump was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I which was written by Kristin Lund and released in 2000. It was confirmed to be canon in the roleplaying game Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, which was released in 2016.
